src/lib/engines/temporal.ts.description: Layer 2 chrono-node validation implemented. validateWithChronoNode() validates AI-extracted dates by matching raw text, position (±10 chars), or parsed date value against chrono.parse() results. filterHallucinatedDates() keeps: chrono-validated events, relative/resolved dates, and high-confidence events. Unvalidated low-confidence absolute dates are filtered as likely hallucinations. metadata.validationLayersUsed now includes ['ai', 'chrono'].
